package.name: libstdc++-musl
package.build:
cd gcc-build
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-i386-musl/bin:$PATH export CLFS_HOST=$(echo ${MACHTYPE} | sed "s/-[^-]*/-cross/") export CLFS_TARGET=i386-linux-musl export CLFS_CPU=i686
../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/libstdc++-v3/configure \ --host=$CLFS_TARGET \ --prefix=/usr/local/crosstools-i386-musl \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-nls \ --disable-libstdcxx-threads \ --disable-libstdcxx-pch \ --with-gxx-include-dir=/usr/local/crosstools-i386-musl/${CLFS_TARGET}/include/c++/${PKGVERSION} make -j4
